title: This for dear friends in London and them that are aboard the ship in order to transportation, or else where all abroad
author: Dewsbury, William, 1621-1688.
notes: Two letters signed W.D.; the first dated, 12th day of the 6 moneth, 1665, the second dated, 26 day of 6 month, 1664.
Attributed by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints to William Dewsbury.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
